txt.en: 'Bring me Tokens of Heroism from your battles across the lands of Middle-earth, and I shall see to it that you are rewarded in kind.'
Bring Tokens of Heroism to the hardened traveller

The hardened traveller has set you upon a dangerous path through Middle-earth. He represents a faction of Rangers who guide those who would walk upon the Paths of Valour.

As you do battle with enemies across the fields and mountains of Middle-earth, you may come upon the occasional Token of Heroism after your victories.

The hardened traveller has offered to claim these Tokens of Heroism from you in return for standing within the Paths of Valour.
'I see you have returned with the Tokens of Heroism I requested.'
You will need to collect more Tokens of Valour before I can accept them.
Collect Tokens of Heroism from your battles across Middle-earth.
